file_content.text: Victory is almost upon us, but you ignore a closer threat...
Lana and Theron gave up everything to build the Alliance. They won't turn against me now.
I trust them.
We shall see...
I'm done listening to you, old man.
No more games.
Anyone who moves against me will pay.
If they betray me, they die.
When they show their true faces, you must stand by your conviction.
Victory is almost upon us, but you ignore a closer threat...
Strike down my family, and you face no competition for the throne.
Your family helped me save Odessen and defeat Vaylin. I won't turn against them now.
They earned my trust.
Do not underestimate the temptation of the Eternal Throne.
One more interruption, and I'll give Arcann the throne just to spite you.
Quiet, old man.
You would not dare.
If they move against me, they're dead. But until that happens, they get to keep their lives.
If they betray me, they die.
A lack of conviction will be your downfall.
Zakuul burns.
The Republic suffers.
And the Sith Empire crumbles.
Only you can pacify the throne--and end this cycle of violence.
Only you can command the throne--and harness the power of the Eternal Fleet.
The Sith who fled her empire.
And the charming spy, sired by Republic heroes.
Do they truly serve you? Or do they plot your downfall, to claim the throne for their respective factions?
I only observe the obvious.
A disgraced former emperor.
And his mother, a knight turned traitor.
Strike down my family, and you will face no competition for the throne.
